title: I want to start a 1st time tech-based business, and I need a simple idea. What is a tech-based business that the world could use? - Quora

response.answer_text: That’s not the way it works. Either you see a need, think you can fill it (and make a profit doing so), and then you figure out how to get your product or service to market. Or, You have an itch you want to scratch, and figure out how to make a buck doing so. If you don’t have either, then buy into a successful franchise, or buy a going business.
